rlu.sqltrainer.persistence
Class XMLFileHandler

java.lang.Object
  rlu.sqltrainer.persistence.XMLFileHandler

public class XMLFileHandler
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements transformations between internal object-oriented representations and external XML representations of domain objects for the SQL Trainer.

Author:
R. Lunde

getXMLData

private java.lang.String getXMLData(org.w3c.dom.Node node)
                             throws javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
Helper method which transforms a hierarchical node structure into a string with XML tags. It is used to convert HTML substructures into a String attribute value.

Throws:
javax.xml.transform.TransformerException

computeHashValue

private java.lang.String computeHashValue(ExerciseSet exercises)
Computes a hash value for editing information and answers. The result is used to check the integrity of loaded exercise sets.

transformExerciseSetToHTML

public void transformExerciseSetToHTML(java.io.File xmlFile,
                                       java.io.File htmlFile,
                                       boolean withSolutions)
                                throws PersistenceException
Creates a HTML representation for a given XML file.

Parameters:
xmlFile - Source file containing exercise set data.
htmlFile - Destination file.
withSolutions - Controls whether solutions are also printed out.
Throws:
PersistenceException
